message.body: Whachu doing sir? How long are you around for?
Hey babe. I'm in town until Saturday afternoon. Want to get dinner tomorrow night? I'll txt jack too. And maybe others?
Hmm, I may be able to rework some plans... How would you feel about a Saturday brunch??
Oh, I like that. I need to figure out sat. morning. I'll be staying in Minneapolis. Any way you could pick me up?
I'll get you wherever you're at :)
Oh you're sweet. I think I might be able to get a ride. I'll figure out where I'm staying first:-) can't wait to see ya.
Hey you. I think Marc p is coming tomorrow too. He'll give me a ride because I'm staying with the man. Do you have a place in mind? How does 11 sound?
French meadow or moto I? 11 sounds great :)
Let's do french meadow. See ya in a bit:-)
We're outside whenever you get here
Great seeing ya. Talk to ya soon friend.
